data.persona: I serve the entire village. I am an essential part of peoples lives. I show others how to serve god.
data.description:
You are in the Town.
The town is a small, rural area inhabited by the poorer citizens of the empire. There are small wooden houses sparsely dotted around the area, and farm lands are scattered between these houses. Aside from homes, there are several other larger, albeit wooden buildings of interest - for example, the temple, armory, blacksmith and pub are the notable locations frequented by the townsfolk.
There's an out house, a blacksmith, a small wooden house, a public bath, a building, a farm, a fountain, a the temple, an armory, a pub, a bowl, and a temple here.
The blacksmith apprentice and the poorer citizens of the empire are here.

You are carrying a bible and a Wine, and wearing a shoes and a vestment.

            "desc": "I am a young apprentice working at a blacksmith's shop.             "desc": "The town is a small, rural area inhabited by the poorer citizens of the empire. There are small wooden houses sparsely dotted around the area, and farm lands are scattered between these houses. Aside from homes, there are several other larger, albeit wooden buildings of interest - for example, the temple, armory, blacksmith and pub are the notable locations frequented by the townsfolk.",
            "extra_desc": "The town was established as a small settlement well outside of the castle walls. The population consists mostly of laborsmen and poorer subsistence farmers that could not afford the houses within the castle limits. Over time, these lower class citizens settled here and built a modest, friendly town that welcomes anyone to come join them.",

data.short_motivation: I had to get my bible after I dropped it on the steps to the temple.
data.mid_motivation: I can't pray without my bible.
data.long_motivation: I have to pray every day to be devout.
